argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tuslem.k | |- K = ( toUnifSp ` U ) |
| 2 |  | #P_utoptopon | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( unifTop ` U ) e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( unifTop ` U ) = ( unifTop ` U ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_tustopn | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( unifTop ` U ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_tusbas | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> X = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( TopOn ` X ) = ( TopOn ` ( Base ` K ) ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 4, 6 | #P_3eltr3d | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( TopOpen ` K ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` K ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` K ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_istps | |- ( K e. TopSp <-> ( TopOpen ` K ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` K ) ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_sylibr | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> K e. TopSp ) |
